title: wine_Elk_Cove_2012_Roosevelt_Pinot_Noir_(Willamette_Valley)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 47915.
country: US.
description: A star even among a stellar group of 2012 releases from Elk Cove, this 20-year-old vineyard really delivers the goods. Time has tempered the herbal aromatics, giving this rich, ripe effort a subtle subtext of olive and sage. Black cherry, dark chocolate and a dusty, mocha finish with a hint of habanero pepper bring this wine together beautifully. Delicious already, it should continue to improve 2025–2030..
designation: Roosevelt.
points: 95.
price: 85.0.
province: Oregon.
region_1: Willamette Valley.
region_2: Willamette Valley.
taster_name: Paul Gregutt.
taster_twitter_handle: @paulgwine .
title: Elk Cove 2012 Roosevelt Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley).
